all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And even so will I gather mine elect from the four quarters of the earth, even as many as will believe in me, and hearken unto my voice.
Doctrine and Covenants 33:6
Quote of the Day
"It is the combination of priesthood ordinances along with the keeping of covenant promises that allows us to draw upon God’s power."
Emily Belle Freeman | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
